definitions.body: unclean bird, the ibis, water-hen, LXX. porfuri/wn, (acc. Tristar:NHB 249); or species of owl (Di Bu SS); pelican (Ges): Le 11:18 = De 14:16.

unclean [[שֶׁרֶץ]] Le 11:30, lizard (Saad Tristr:NHB 120), or chameleon (Bo:Hieroz. i. 1078 ff.; ed. Rosenm. ii. 503 ff.), so most; (deriving name from alleged living on air, Plin:NH viii. 51; but this not applicable to
